DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study identify magnitude muscle lipid redistribution muscle oxygen use individual 60 year old old follow combine treatment vitamin D repletion aerobic training compare vitamin D repletion alone , aerobic train alone , treatment .
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator plan recruit approximately 56 aged individual vitamin D insufficiency 13 week trial . All subject 60 year age old . Participants randomize one four group : vitamin D ( 50,000IU/wk ) + aerobic training ( 7 day 13th week ) ; vitamin D ( 50,000IU/wk ) + normal daily activity 13th week ; placebo + aerobic training ( 7 day 13th week ) ; placebo + normal daily activity 13th week . Following screen informed consent process physical activity questionnaire administer . A blood draw conduct baseline , midpoint endpoint . Collected blood purpose study assess vitamin D status ( 25 ( OH ) D ) , parathyroid hormone , ionized calcium , insulin , comprehensive metabolic panel . At baseline endpoint muscle lipid assess use Magnetic Resonance Spectroscopy muscle oxygen consumption determine use novel hybrid diffuse optical instrument consist near-infrared spectroscopy diffuse correlation spectroscopy . In addition , study time point 3 dietary recall complete physical activity measure use accelerometer .
DOC.criteria: Age : 60 old BMI : 18.529 Communicates fluently English Metal implant suitable MRI Any form hormone replacement therapy Engage 1 hr/week vigorous activity Participated highintensity resistance aerobic training program last 3 month Lower extremity injury surgery past 3 month Foot sores bone condition severely limit ability move perform exercise joint pain make bad mild exercise Diabetes , inflammatory bowel disease , renal disease uncontrolled hypertension . Currently history cardiovascular pulmonary disease would preclude involvement performance exercise History myopathy ( include congenital myopathy ) History neurological condition relate spinal derangement , disk disease , peripheral neuropathy , tremor rigidity Past medical history hyperparathyroidism , kidney stone rhabdomyolysis Currently receive treatment vitamin D deficiency Vitamin D level > 30ng/mL Currently smoke
